pcep.description: The configuration of PCEP(Path Compute Element Protocol).

router-id.description: The PCEP IPv4 router ID configuration.

router-id-v6.description: The PCEP IPv6 route ID configuration.

pcc.description: The configuration of PCC(Path Computation Client).

peer.description: The peer configuration list of PCC.

peer-router-id.description: The IPv4 router id of peer.

peer-router-id-v6.description: The IPv6 router id of peer.

peer-router-id-type-choice-clear.description: Remove value of any entities which belong to any case within this choice.

peer-router-id-type-all-clear.description: Remove this entitiy means to remove value of any entities which belong to any case within this choice.

slave-peer-router-id.description: The IPv4 router id of slave peer.

slave-peer-router-id-v6.description: The IPv6 router id of slave peer.

slave-peer-router-id-type-all-clear.description: Remove this entitiy means to remove value of any entities which belong to any case within this choice.

dead-time.description: The timeout time for the peer.

request-response-wait.description: The time waiting for the response of request.

keepalive-min.description: The minimal interval of keepalive message whitch accepted from peer node.

lsp-names.description: Lsp name configuration for te tunnel.

state-time-enable.description: Enable LSP state timeout interval configuration.

update.description: The configuration of state update capacity.

srp.description: Enable the segment routing policy capability.

report-pcc-create-lsp.description: Configure LSP created by PCC report capability

report-none-instance-lsp.description: Configure LSP with none instance report capability

pce-auto-initiate.description: Configure PCE automatically trigger LSP instantiation

message-rate-limit.description: Configure max pcinit and pcupd message pcc can process per minute

max-time.description: Maximum backoff time of PCEP Session

slave-lsp-names.description: Slave LSP name configuration for TE tunnel.

peer-keepalive-min.description: The minimal interval of keepalive message which accepted from peer node.

local-dead-time.description: Local timeout time for the peer.

peer-dead-time.description: Peer timeout time for the peer.

unknown-msg-max-num.description: The maximum tolerable number of unknown messages per minute.

unknown-msg-rate.description: The number of unknown messages per minute.

reply-wait-time.description: The time waiting for the reply of request.

sent-keepalive-msg-num.description: The number of keepalive messages sent by PCC.

received-keepalive-msg-num.description: The number of keepalive messages received by PCC.

sent-request-msg-num.description: The number of request messages sent by PCC.

received-request-msg-num.description: The number of request messages received by PCC.

sent-reply-msg-num.description: The number of reply messages sent by PCC.

received-reply-msg-num.description: The number of reply messages received by PCC.

sent-report-msg-num.description: The number of report messages sent by PCC.

received-report-msg-num.description: The number of report messages received by PCC.

sent-update-msg-num.description: The number of update messages sent by PCC.

received-update-msg-num.description: The number of update messages received by PCC.

sent-init-msg-num.description: The number of initiate messages sent by PCC.

received-init-msg-num.description: The number of initiate messages received by PCC.

sent-error-msg-num.description: The number of error messages sent by PCC.

received-error-msg-num.description: The number of error messages received by PCC.

sent-notify-msg-num.description: The number of notify messages sent by PCC.

received-notify-msg-num.description: The number of notify messages received by PCC.

received-unknown-msg-num.description: The number of unknown messages received by PCC.
